message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_SECTION
message.locale: This section cannot be deleted as it is referenced by the %1s application.

message.name: ERR_SECTION_ALREADY_EXISTS_CANNOT_CREATE
message.locale: A section configuration with an ID of %1s already exists. Please specify a different Section ID.

message.name: ERR_SECTION_CONFIGURATION_ISSUE
message.locale: The section configuration with ID %1s contains an error.

message.name: ERR_TAB_EXISTS_FOR_SECTION
message.locale: The section configuration with ID %1s already contains a reference to the %2s tab. Please select a different tab.
